title: The Mechanism of Life
creator_credit: Sakura Motion Pictures, Eiji Murayama and Masami Sugiyama
brief_description: Shows how biochemists study cellular life. Experiments are shown to support the theory of evolution of life from the four elements, carbon, hydrogen, oxygen and nitrogen. The methods used to study muscle protein and insulin are also shown.
